summary: An Oslo detective visits a hick town to investigate some murders rumored by the locals to have been the work of 'angels'. More likely, given the unsavory types he meets, vengeance and vigilantism are the very human motivations behind.
cast: Reidar Sørensen|Jon Øigarden|Gaute Boris Skjegstad|Trond Høvik|Stig Henrik Hoff|Laila Goody|Simon Norrthon|Kjersti Holmen|Ingar Helge Gimle|Bjørn Floberg|Bjørn Sundquist|Kåre Conradi|Elisabeth Sand|Trond Brænne|Beate Bruland|Aksel Hennie|Trond Fausa|Trond Espen Seim|Ove Christian Owe|Karl Sundby|Annika With|Aud Schønemann|Ingunn Beate Øyen|Cecilie A. Mosli|Halvard Haldorsen|Kjetil Indregard|Linn Skåber|Tone Johnsen|Pernille Vestengen|Marianne Holmen|Anja Rasmussen|Geir Kolden|Eli Anne Linnestad|Rita Gulliksen|Chris Fürst|Sven Ytterlid|Jørgen Næss|Bjørn Ove Pedersen|Haakon Kristoffer Holmen|Simen Stenvik Granly|Erik Stenvik Granly
keywords: child with a gun|gun|school|kidnapping|address as title
title: 1732 Høtten
